Class List

Here are the classes, structs, unions and interfaces with brief descriptions:
AlvarExceptionALVAR exception class
BitsetBitset is a basic class for handling bit sequences
BitsetExtAn extended Bitset ( BitsetExt ) for handling e.g. Hamming encoding/decoding
CameraSimple Camera class for calculating distortions, orientation or projections with pre-calibrated camera
CameraECVersion of Camera using external container
CaptureCapture interface that plugins must implement
CaptureDeviceCaptureDevice holder for camera information
CaptureFactoryCaptureFactory for creating Capture classes
CaptureFileImplementation of Capture interface for File plugin
CaptureHighguiImplementation of Capture interface for Highgui plugin
CapturePluginCapturePlugin interface that plugins must implement
CapturePluginFileImplementation of CapturePlugin interface for File plugin
CapturePluginHighguiImplementation of CapturePlugin interface for Highgui plugin
Container3d< T >Generic container to store any information in 3D (features, photos, ...)
Container3dLimitDist< T >Functor class for Container3d Limit() to limit the search space with distance
Container3dSortDist< T >Functor class for Container3d Sort() to sort the search base using distance to specified origin
Container3dSortSize< T >Functor class for Container3d Sort() to sort the search base using content size
DirectoryIteratorDirectoryIterator for iterating over files and directories
DoEraseTest< T >This is default functor for testing which items in the container should be erased
DoHandleTest< T >This is a default functor for testing which items in the container should be handled by each method
ExternalContainerBasic structure to be usable with EC methods
FeatureExtended version of ExternalContainer structure used internally in SimpleSfM
FernClassifierWrapperFernClassifier subclass that implements binary reading and writting
FernImageDetectorImage detector based on a Fern classifier
FernPoseEstimatorPose estimation class for FernImageDetector
FileFormatUtilsUtility functions for file reading / writing
FilterFilter is pure virtual class describing the basic virtual interface for all filters
FilterArray< F >Class for handling an array of filtered values
FilterAverageFilterAverage provides an average filter
FilterDoubleExponentialSmoothingFilterDoubleExponentialSmoothing provides an weighted running average filter
FilterMedianFilterMedian provides an median filter
FilterRunningAverageFilterRunningAverage provides an weighted running average filter
HistogramClass for N-dimensional Histograms
HistogramSubpixelN-dimensional Histograms calculating also the subpixel average for max bin
HomographySimple Homography class for finding and projecting points between two planes
IndexClass for N-dimensional index to be used e.g. with STL maps
IndexRansac< MODEL >Implementation of a general RANdom SAmple Consensus algorithm with implicit parameters
IntegralGradientIntegralGradient is used for calculating rectangular image gradients rapidly
IntegralImageIntegralImage is used for calculating rectangular image sums and averages rapidly
IntIndexClass for calculating "evenly spaced" integer indices for data sequence
IteratorIterator for going through the items in Container3d in the specified order
KalmanKalman implementation
KalmanCoreCore implementation for Kalman
KalmanEkfExtended Kalman Filter (EKF) implementation
KalmanSensorKalman sensor implementation
KalmanSensorCoreCore implementation for Kalman sensor
KalmanSensorEkfExtended Kalman Filter (EKF) sensor implementation
KalmanVisualizeClass for visualizing Kalman filter
LabelingBase class for labeling connected components from binary image
LabelingCvSeqLabeling class that uses OpenCV routines to find connected components
LineStruct representing a line. The line is parametrized by its center and direction vector
LockLock for simplifying mutex handling
MarkerBasic 2D Marker functionality
MarkerArtoolkitMarkerArtoolkit for using matrix markers similar with the ones used in ARToolkit
MarkerDataMarkerData contains matrix of Hamming encoded data
MarkerDetector< M >MarkerDetector for detecting markers of type M
MarkerDetectorEC< M >Version of MarkerDetector using external container
MarkerDetectorImplTemplateless version of MarkerDetector. Please use MarkerDetector instead
MarkerIteratorIterator type for traversing templated Marker vector without the template
MarkerIteratorImpl< T >Iterator implementation for traversing templated Marker vector without the template
MarkerMeasurementMarkerMeasurement that holds the maker id
MultiMarkerBase class for using MultiMarker
MultiMarkerBundleMulti marker that uses bundle adjustment to refine the 3D positions of the markers (point cloud)
MultiMarkerECVersion of MultiMarker using external container
MultiMarkerFilteredMulti marker that is constructed by first calculating the marker poses directly relative to base marker and then filtering the results using e.g. median filter
MultiMarkerInitializerInitializes multi marker by estimating their relative positions from one or more images
MutexMutex for synchronizing multiple threads
OptimizationNon-linear optimization routines. There are three methods implemented that include Gauss-Newton, Levenberg-Marquardt and Tukey m-estimator
PluginPlugin for loading dynamic libraries
Point< C, D >Simple Point class meant to be inherited from OpenCV point-classes. For example: Point<CvPoint2D64f> p
PosePose representation derived from the Rotation class
ProjPointsSimple structure for collecting 2D and 3D points e.g. for camera calibration
Ransac< MODEL, PARAMETER >Implementation of a general RANdom SAmple Consensus algorithm
RansacImplInternal implementation of RANSAC. Please use Ransac or IndexRansac
RotationRotation structure and transformations between different parameterizations
SerializationClass for serializing class content to/from file or std::iostream
SimpleSfMSimple structure from motion implementation using CameraEC , MarkerDetectorEC and TrackerFeaturesEC
ThreadsThreads vector for handling multiple threads
TimerTimer for measuring execution time
TrackerPure virtual base class for tracking optical flow
TrackerFeaturesTrackerFeatures tracks features using OpenCV's cvGoodFeaturesToTrack and cvCalcOpticalFlowPyrLK
TrackerFeaturesECVersion of TrackerFeatures using external container
TrackerOrientationTrack orientation based only on features in the image plane
TrackerPsaTrackerPsa implements a very simple PSA tracker
TrackerPsaRotTrackerPsaRot implements a slightly extended version of a TrackerPsa which can also detect sideways rotation
TrackerStatTrackerStat deduces the optical flow based on tracked features using Seppo Valli's statistical tracking
TrackerStatRotTrackerStatRot implements a slightly extended version of TrackerStat which can also detect sideways rotation
TrifocalTensorTrifocal tensor works for three images like a fundamental matrix works for two images
UncopyableUncopyable for preventing object copies
UnscentedKalmanImplementation of unscented kalman filter (UKF) for filtering non-linear processes
UnscentedObservationObservation model for an unscented kalman filter
UnscentedProcessProcess model for an unscented kalman filter
